Package be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.Input

Class AbsInput

java.lang.Object
be.uantwerpen.fti.ei.jw.SpaceInvadersV3.Input.AbsInput
Direct Known Subclasses:
Keyboard1PlayerInput, Keyboard2PlayerInput
public class AbsInput extends Object
An AbsInput class is an abstract class that contains all the necessary information for the game logic to work. It holds different booleans that can be switched on or off based on the current inputs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AbsInput(int amOfPlayers)
    Constructs an AbsInput object with the specified number of players.

    Method
    Description
    List<Boolean>
    getLeftPressed()
    Returns the list of booleans indicating whether the "left" button is pressed for each player.

    Returns the list of booleans indicating whether the "right" button is pressed for each player.
    List<Boolean>
    getShootPressed()
    Returns the list of booleans indicating whether the "shoot" button is pressed for each player.
    boolean
    isPausePressed()
    Returns whether the "pause" button is pressed or not
    void
    togglePausePressed()
    Will toggle between "true" or "false" whenever the pause-key is pressed
